U1.name: ExperiencedStrongMale
U1.notes: Experienced lifter, high absolute strength, slower progress, occasional plateau, deload in week 7.

U2.name: IntermediateFemaleReturner
U2.notes: Intermediate lifter returning after 6-week break. Faster early progress, one missed week, then normal progression.

U3.name: LightweightAdvancedFemale
U3.notes: Lightweight, very strong relative to body weight, progress is very slow, relies on microloading, sensitive to fatigue.

U4.name: IntermediateMaleCutting
U4.notes: Intermediate lifter in calorie deficit. Strength plateaus and slight regressions appear mid-cycle; needs conservative progression and deload.
